EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email Template sent to Reviewers when Application or Preapplication is assigned to them for review
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Reviewer to Review Application
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Application {!Review__c.ApplicationID__c} is Assigned to you for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Review__c.OwnerFullName},
Application {!Review__c.ApplicationID__c} is ready for your review. Please click here {!Review__c.ReviewURL__c} to review the application assigned to you.
The deadline to complete review is {!Review__c.ReviewDueDate__c}
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
